about_the_game:
Celine thought her life as an American office worker was mundane, but after a fatal accident, she wakes up as an extra character in her favorite web novel a BL tragedy fantasy. Expected to die early as part of the protagonist's backstory, Celine defies fate and survives her death event, causing a butterfly effect that catapults her into the role of the Saintess of the Golden Bow.

Joined by an unforgettable cast of characters including the valiant knight Levi, the enigmatic Mad Prince Noah, and the devout High Priest Elijah you must lead a quest to defeat the Demon Queen and bring peace to the realm. Each choice you make weaves a complex web of romance, friendship, and sacrifice, offering a deeply personal and replayable journey.

Three Romantic Routes: Explore deep, emotionally driven romances with three distinct characters, each with their own backstories, personalities, and challenges. Your choices define your relationship, from tender moments to heart-wrenching conflicts.

Over 30 Hours of Gameplay: Immerse yourself in an epic narrative packed with twists, character development, and surprises. With its expansive story, this visual novel guarantees hours of thrilling content and a world worth revisiting.

Ten Unique Endings: Every decision matters, leading you to a variety of possible conclusions. Whether your story ends in love, loss, or triumph depends on the paths you choose and the bonds you form along the way.

Affection System: Build meaningful relationships with the cast through carefully crafted dialogue and actions. Monitor your affection levels to influence the story and unlock special events or CGs.

Stunning CG Artwork: Discover beautifully illustrated scenes that capture pivotal and intimate moments in your journey. Each CG adds emotional depth and serves as a keepsake of your choices.
Complex Fantasy World: Dive into a richly detailed setting rife with challenges like forbidden love, class divides, and the battle between good and evil. Experience the chaos of war, abandonment, and adventure while exploring a realm full of intricate lore and vibrant characters.

Transparent Games is co-financed by the European Funds for the Modern Economy 2021-2027 as part of the KPT ScaleUp Booster project.

short_description: Reborn as the Saintess of the Golden Bow in your favorite fantasy novel, rewrite fate in this otome visual novel. Forge bonds, evade death, and battle the Demon Queen, your choices shape the realm's destiny. Will you save the world or meet a tragic end?
